name: @iml/srcmap-reverser
description: Reverse a single line using a specified source map.

scripts.prepublish: old_pwd=$PWD; cd ../..; yarn run rollup -- -i $old_pwd/source/index.js -o $old_pwd/$npm_package_main; cp $old_pwd/node_modules/@iml/gui/dist/main*.js.map $old_pwd/dist/main.js.map

author: IML Team
